abstract: Pamela Tatge, the director of the Center for the Arts at Wesleyan University, is to take over beginning April 18.

headline.print_headline: Jacob’s Pillow Festival Has a New Director
headline.main: A New Director for Jacob’s Pillow Dance Festival

snippet: Pamela Tatge, the director of the Center for the Arts at Wesleyan University, is to take over beginning April 18.
